struct.name: EcimPassword
struct.description: This struct stores the password which is set by an operator via NETCONF or CLI.

structMember.name: cleartext
structMember.description: Indicates if the password is entered in cleartext or not.

structMember.name: password
structMember.description: Holds the password or passphrase text.

enum.name: NasPortType
enum.description: Type of physical port of the NAS

enumMember.name: no-nas-port-type
enumMember.description: Do not send NAS-Port-Type in RADIUS messages

enum.name: FramedProtocol
enum.description: Framing to be used for access

enumMember.name: no-framed-protocol
enumMember.description: Do not send Framed-Protocol in RADIUS messages

derivedDataType.name: RangedString2
derivedDataType.description: The prefix is a string up to 2 digits

derivedDataType.name: RangedString64
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: ServerdownTimeout
derivedDataType.description: Time before retrying requests to a down server

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: PriorityKey
derivedDataType.description: String containing only decimal digits. First digit cannot be zero, range is 1-999999.

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

class.name: Accounting
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $server in @sharedServer satisfies (not(exists(./Server/@serverID)))'><name path='.'/>,sharedServer: The following attributes can not be combined: Server, shared-server</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $server in @sharedServer satisfies ($server = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Radius/Server/@serverId)'><name path='.'/>,sharedServer: Server must be configured under 'managed-element epg pgw radius server'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: accountingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: wppCompatibleEncoding
attribute.description: Encode RADIUS attributes in a format compatible with WPP GGSN

attribute.name: messageForEveryContext
attribute.description: Send start/interim/stop message for every PDP context

attribute.name: noAccountingOn
attribute.description: Don't send accounting on and off messages

attribute.name: noAccountingOnRespNeeded
attribute.description: Accounting on response not needed

attribute.name: unAcknowledge
attribute.description: Run in Un-Acknowledge mode

attribute.name: sharedServer
attribute.description: Shared RADIUS server for authentication

attribute.name: forcedRetry
attribute.description: Continue with the next RADIUS server for the same PDP-context after max fail retries

attribute.name: forceMulticast
attribute.description: Sends to multicast server(s) without waiting for the primary respone

class.name: Server
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@sharedServer))'><name path='.'/>: The following attributes can not be combined: Server, shared-server</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: RADIUS server address

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Request timeout period

attribute.name: retry
attribute.description: Retry attempts

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: Port number for RADIUS messages

attribute.name: secret
attribute.description: Shared secret with the RADIUS server

attribute.name: serverdownTimeout
attribute.description: Time before retrying requests to a down server

attribute.name: multicast
attribute.description: Allow server to participate in RADIUS multicast

attribute.name: serverID
attribute.description: Server ID. Determines priority by lexical order.

attribute.name: noInterimUpdateMulticast
attribute.description: Don't send interim multicast to this RADIUS server

class.name: MessageAttributes
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @msisdnValue satisfies (not(exists(./Msisdn)))'><name path='.'/>,msisdnValue: The following attributes can not be combined: msisdn, msisdn-value</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @nasPort satisfies (not(exists(@nasPortValue)))'><name path='.'/>,nasPort: The following attributes can not be combined: nas-port, nas-port-value</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @nasPortValue satisfies (not(exists(@nasPort)))'><name path='.'/>,nasPortValue: The following attributes can not be combined: nas-port, nas-port-value</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: messageAttributesID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: apnIdentifier
attribute.description: Include APN name

attribute.name: apnSelectionMode
attribute.description: Include APN selection information

attribute.name: chargingCharacteristics
attribute.description: Include charging characteristics

attribute.name: ggsnAddress
attribute.description: Include GGSN node address

attribute.name: gprsQos
attribute.description: Include GPRS quality of service

attribute.name: gprsQosExtended
attribute.description: Include GPRS extended quality of service

attribute.name: gprsQosRelease7
attribute.description: Include Release 7 GPRS quality of service

attribute.name: epsQos
attribute.description: Change the format of AVP qos-negotiation to new GTPv2 format.

attribute.name: imsi
attribute.description: Include IMSI

attribute.name: msTimezone
attribute.description: Include MS timezone

attribute.name: chargingGateway
attribute.description: Include charging gateway address

attribute.name: noNasIdentifier
attribute.description: Do not send NAS-Identifier in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: noServiceType
attribute.description: Do not send Service-Type in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: userLocationInfo
attribute.description: Include user location info

attribute.name: userPlmnId
attribute.description: Include user public land mobile network identifier

attribute.name: nsapi
attribute.description: Include NSAPI

attribute.name: pdpType
attribute.description: Include PDP type

attribute.name: signalingSgsn
attribute.description: Include signaling SGSN address

attribute.name: sgsnPlmnId
attribute.description: Include the SGSN public land mobile network identifier

attribute.name: nasPort
attribute.description: Include NAS port attribute

attribute.name: nasIpAddressValue
attribute.description: NAS IP address set to this value in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: ggsnPlmnId
attribute.description: Include the GGSN public land mobile network identifier

attribute.name: ratType
attribute.description: Include the radio access technology type in the request

attribute.name: imeiSv
attribute.description: Include the IMEI-SV in the request

attribute.name: chargingIdentifier
attribute.description: Include user charging identifier

attribute.name: acctInputOctets
attribute.description: Include the number of octets sent

attribute.name: acctInputGigawords
attribute.description: Include the number of times octets overflew

attribute.name: acctOutputOctets
attribute.description: Include the number of octets received

attribute.name: acctOutputGigawords
attribute.description: Include the number of times octets overflew

attribute.name: acctMultisessionId
attribute.description: Include Multi Session Id and Link Count

attribute.name: packetFilter
attribute.description: Include packet filter

attribute.name: sessionStop
attribute.description: Send session stop message

attribute.name: includeSessionTime
attribute.description: Include session-time in accounting stop

attribute.name: includeSessionTimeInAll
attribute.description: Include session-time in all RADIUS accounting messages

attribute.name: acctInputPackets
attribute.description: Include the number of input packets

attribute.name: acctOutputPackets
attribute.description: Include the number of output packets

attribute.name: negotiatedDscp
attribute.description: Include negotiated DSCP

attribute.name: noAcctAuthentic
attribute.description: Do not send Acct-Authentic in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: framedProtocol
attribute.description: Framing to be used for access

attribute.name: nasPortType
attribute.description: Type of physical port of the NAS

attribute.name: msisdnValue
attribute.description: MSISDN set to this value in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: userValue
attribute.description: User name set to this value in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: nasPortValue
attribute.description: NAS port set to this value in RADIUS messages

attribute.name: eventTimestamp
attribute.description: Include the Event-Timestamp attribute in Radius accounting messages

attribute.name: acctSessionId
attribute.description: Include the Acct-Session-Id attribute in RADIUS authentication messages

attribute.name: interimUpdateID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: transferOnUpdate
attribute.description: Send RADIUS interim update when receiving PDP context update request

attribute.name: acknowledge
attribute.description: Delete PDP context when RADIUS interim response is not received

attribute.name: transferInterval
attribute.description: Send RADIUS interim update periodically

class.name: Msisdn
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@msisdnValue))'><name path='.'/>: The following attributes can not be combined: msisdn, msisdn-value</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: msisdnID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: numericPrefix
attribute.description: A prefix that will be inserted in front of the MSISDN

class.name: AccountingOn
class.dependenciesScript:
<schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule>
<assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@noAccountingOn))'><name path='.'/>: no-accounting-on can not be set when using this configuration</assert>
</rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: accountingOnID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: longRetryTimer
attribute.description: Define the long retry-timer for Accounting-On, default: 60 seconds

attribute.name: noShortTimer
attribute.description: Will disable the short retry-timer for Accounting-On
